body_html: Actually, I've taken it upon myself to re-write this script today so it will work a bit more cleanly, and serialize some new endpoints we're adding to the backend. Since this is such a small change, do you mind if I just add this directly into the new version of the script? Lower friction than going through the pull request.

body: Actually, I've taken it upon myself to re-write this script today so it will work a bit more cleanly, and serialize some new endpoints we're adding to the backend. Since this is such a small change, do you mind if I just add this directly into the new version of the script? Lower friction than going through the pull request.
